channel.title: Product on Christine's Shattered Life
channel.description: Recent content in Product on Christine's Shattered Life

item.title: Notes and Thoughts of Quibi
item.description: 1 Like everything in the world, the launch of Quibi was deeply affected by the COVID-19. Maybe in Jeffrey’s plan, there would be a huge ceremony to announce the birth of Quibi, however, nowadays, with the process of quarantine, any pre-plan seemed in vain. Boldly but not surprisingly, like he refused to produce the Beta version of this app to let a small portion of potential consumers to test it first with $1 billion funding, Jeffrey Katzenberg, the founder of Quibi, decided to not delay the launch of this app.

item.title: Duolingo's English Proficiency Test
item.description: 1. As I was looking through Weibo(the most popular social platform in China, like Twitter), I noticed one of my friend’s weibo saying that she was pretty upset because her Duolingo English Proficiency Test’s result was invalid again. This was her third time taking Duolingo Test and for the first and the second time, the result was cancelled, too. 2. For international students, taking TOEFL or IELTS test is a necessary step if they want to go abroad to have further study.
